content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, thank you for showing interest in my apartment in Mannheim. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. content:
My proposed rental price is 700 Euros per month.

content: Thank you for your proposal, Ryanah. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must unfortunately decline your proposal of 700 Euros per month.
